asap.realizer.anticipator

Class MetronomeAnticipator

  • java.lang.Object
    • asap.realizer.anticipator.Anticipator
      • asap.realizer.anticipator.MetronomeAnticipator

  • @ThreadSafe
public class MetronomeAnticipator
extends Anticipator
    Anticipates the (may be changing through calls of updateTempo) tempo of a metronome.

    welberge
